description:
Meet Paul Cornell, Jr. - this grown man identifies as a 6-year-old, and he's broken literally every record in the Cedar Valley Little League 6U T-ball division. His story is one of bravery, courage, and 450-foot moonshots over the left field wall.

Shop now at https://authentixx.com/. 10% of all sales go to the Independent Women’s Forum. Together, we can save women’s sports.

#baseball #sports #comedy #littleleague #babylonbee
title: Man Identifying As 6-Year-Old Breaks All Records In T-Ball League
